Long_Beach.Bluff Heights, Long Beach, California:
Bluff Heights is a neighborhood in Long Beach, CA composed mainly of Craftsman bungalows constructed from approximately 1910 to 1923.


== Location ==
Bluff Heights is bordered by Broadway on the south, 4th Street on the north, Junipero Avenue and Wisconsin Avenue on the west, and Redondo Avenue on the East.
Bluff Heights is directly north of Bluff Park and south of Rose Park South.
